1511.content: The cubs glanced at each other. "Cheese it!" They said in unison. They ran off giggling, their soiled underwear bouncing. The caretaker groans, and gives chase. As they are being chased...
1511.title: ...decide to run!

choices: Hide in the bathroom and clean up
Sneak around until his pants dry
15112.content: As they were running Jake felt a tickle in his bladder and began to hold himself while running, they both stop and hide as they watch the caretaker run by them, Jake then sighs as he wets himself, he also blushes as he feels his pants get wet, how would they hide this from the care taker?
15112.title: Jake has to pee

choices: Mac and Cheese with Chocolate milk
1512.content: Both cubs looked at the Caretaker with the most innocent faces to try to get off the hook and after about a minute of staring the caretaker decides to give them another chance and help them out. Both cubs are walked to the big bathroom and given a bath while thier undies are washed. They are then put back into the same cloths. While the twins are playing it is now lunch time. They are serving...
1512.title: ...ask the caretaker for a chance?

choices: Continue to fart to alieve pressure
Sneak away and poop their undies in private
154.content: Both cubs decided to hold it. Through out the day they kept letting out more and more farts. It was almost lunch time when the cubs had sat down at their table. Jake let out a really wet fart and then Jack did the same. They were almost certain that that last fart had stained their undies. Both cubs decided to...
154.title: Hold it, for now

info.brief_description: Two twin bear cubs haveing fun with the fact that they are both very gassy.
info.description: Two cubs have fun tormenting daycare workers with thier “natural talent”
